articles.title: The marriage of sports and technology can help narrow the gender gap
articles.description: A recent event hosted by Tata Communications with Formula 1 showcased how women and girls are pursuing education and careers in STEM fields.

articles.author: Nicholas Fearn
articles.title: As cloud tech powers the world's most popular sports leagues, everyone from executives and coaches to players and fans reap the benefits
articles.description: Cloud tech allows sports organizations to upgrade their businesses and fan experiences. Coaches use the cloud to boost game plans and player training.

articles.author: Joel Khalili
articles.title: Idris Elba Is Ready to Talk About Crypto
articles.description: During the crypto gold rush, Idris Elba says he turned down a lot of “mad opportunities.” Now he has partnered with the “crypto-for-good” Stellar Foundation.
articles.content: Idris Elba learned about crypto at the same time as almost everyone else: when prices went through the roof. The British actor and filmmaker, best known for his roles in TV series The Wire and Luther… [+2764 chars]
